name: patrickhenrycollege
0:
”Alexa, start patrick henry college.”
”where is the campus?”
”what distinguishes a PHC education?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: patrick henry college
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Our voice app lets you learn more about Patrick Henry College. Ask frequently asked questions about us and the voice assistant will happily answer them.

Patrick Henry College exists to glorify God by challenging the unacceptable status quo in higher education, lifting high both faith and reason within a rigorous academic environment; thereby preserving for posterity the ideals behind the "noble experiment in ordered liberty" that is the foundation of America.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
